member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget
member.summary: This class represents a NUIGadget controlled lifecycles.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.NUIGadgetInfo
member.summary: Gets the class representing information of the current gadget.
member.remarks: This property is set before the OnCreate() is called, after the instance has been created.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.Type
member.summary: Gets the type.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.ClassName
member.summary: Gets the class name.
member.remarks: This property is set before the OnCreate() is called, after the instance has been created.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.MainView
member.summary: Gets the main view.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.State
member.summary: Gets the lifecycle state.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.NUIGadgetResourceManager
member.summary: Gets the resource manager.
member.remarks: This property is set before the OnCreate() is called, after the instance has been created.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnCreate
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the gedget is started. If 'base.OnCreate()' is not called, the event 'NUIGadgetLifecycleChanged' with the 'NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Created' state will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnAppControlReceived(Tizen.Applications.AppControlReceivedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the gadget receives the appcontrol message.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnDestroy
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the gadget is destroyed. If 'base.OnDestroy()' is not called. the event 'NUIGadgetLifecycleChanged' with the 'NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Destroyed' state will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnPause
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the gadget is paused. If 'base.OnPause()' is not called. the event 'NUIGadgetLifecycleChanged' with the 'NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Paused' state will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnResume
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the gadget is resumed. If 'base.OnResume()' is not called. the event 'NUIGadgetLifecycleChanged' with the 'NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Resumed' state will not be emitted.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnLocaleChanged(Tizen.Applications.LocaleChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system language is changed.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnLowBattery(Tizen.Applications.LowBatteryEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system battery is low.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnLowMemory(Tizen.Applications.LowMemoryEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the system memory is low.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnRegionFormatChanged(Tizen.Applications.RegionFormatChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the region format is changed.
member.param: The region format changed event argument.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.OnDeviceOrientationChanged(Tizen.Applications.DeviceOrientationEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides this method if want to handle behavior when the device orientation is changed.
member.param: The device orientation changed event argument.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget.Finish
member.summary: Finishes the gadget.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo
member.summary: This class provides properties to get information the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.PackageId
member.summary: Gets the package ID of the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.ResourceType
member.summary: Gets the resource type of the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.ResourceVersion
member.summary: Gets the resource version of the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.ResourcePath
member.summary: Gets the resource path of the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.ExecutableFile
member.summary: Gets the executable file of the gadget.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetInfo.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the metadata of the gadget.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Arguments for the event raised when the NUIGadget lifecycle is changed.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleChangedEventArgs.Gadget
member.summary: The NUIGadget object.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleChangedEventArgs.State
member.summary: The state of the NUIGadget lifecycle.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState
member.summary: Enumeration for the lifecycle state of the NUIGadget.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Initialized
member.summary: The initialized state. This state is set when the gadget is initialized. The constructor of the NUIGadget is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Created
member.summary: The created state. This state is set when the gadget is created. The 'OnCreate()' method of the NUIGadget is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Resumed
member.summary: The resumed state. This state is set when the gadget is resumed. The 'OnResume()' method of the NUIGadget is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Paused
member.summary: The paused state. This state is set when the gadget is paused. The 'OnPause()' method of the NUIGadget is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetLifecycleState.Destroyed
member.summary: The destroyed state. This state is set when the gadget is destroyed. The 'OnDestroy()' method of the NUIGadget is called.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager
member.summary: This class has the methods and events of the NUIGadgetManager.

member.name: E:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.NUIGadgetLifecycleChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the lifecycle of the NUIGadget is changed.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a NUIGadget to a NUIGadgetManager.
member.param: The resource type of the NUIGadget package.
The class name of the NUIGadget.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of a invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of an invalid operation.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.GetGadgets
member.summary: Gets the instance of the running NUIGadgets.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.GetGadgetInfos
member.summary: Gets the information of the available NUIGadgets.
member.remarks: This method only returns the available gadget informations, not all installed gadget informations. The resource package of the NUIGadget can set the allowed packages using "allowed-package". When executing an application, the platform mounts the resource package into the resource path of the application.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.Remove(Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget)
member.summary: Removes the NUIGadget from a NUIGadgetManager.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.RemoveAll
member.summary: Removes all NUIGadget from a NUIGadgetManager.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.Resume(Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget)
member.summary: Resumes the running NUIGadget.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.Pause(Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget)
member.summary: Pauses the running NUIGadget.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetManager.SendAppControl(Tizen.NUI.NUIGadget,Tizen.Applications.AppControl)
member.summary: Sends the appcontrol to the running NUIGadget.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of a invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because the argument is null.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetResourceManager
member.summary: This class has the methods of the NUIGadgetResourceManager.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetResourceManager.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the resource manager of the gadget.
member.param: The file name of the resource.
The class name of the resource.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetResourceManager.GetString(System.String)
member.summary: Get the value of the specified string resource.
member.param: The name of the resource to retrieve.
member.returns: The value of the resource, or null if name cannot be found in a resource set.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetResourceManager.GetString(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the return value of the string resource localied for the specified culture.
member.param: The name of the resource to retrieve.
An object that represents the culture for which the resource is localied.
member.returns: The value of the resource localied for the specified culture, or null if name cannot be found in a resource set.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of a invalid argument.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetType
member.summary: Enumeration for the type of the NUIGadget.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetType.Normal
member.summary: The normal type.

member.name: F:Tizen.NUI.NUIGadgetType.Popup
member.summary: The popup type.
